### Libraries

```{r}
library("here")
```

### Download data

```{r}
curl::curl_download(url = "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/download/?acc=GSE41080&format=file", 
                    destfile = "~/projects/group_02_project/data/_raw/GSE41080_RAW.tar")
```

```{r}
curl::curl_download(url = "https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/instance/3658270/bin/msb201315-s2.csv", 
                    destfile = "data/_raw/msb201315-s2.csv")
```

### Expression

```{r}
untar("~/projects/group_02_project/data/_raw/GSE41080_RAW.tar", 
      exdir = here("data","expression"))
```
